lookup CC-HIC codes

Source: R/utils.R
lookup_hic.Rd

lookup CC-HIC codes

lookup_hic(search_term = "NIHR_HIC_ICU_0108", type = c("code", "name"))

Arguments

search_term

code name for a CC-HIC data item, either as a full string (e.g. "NIHR_HIC_ICU_0108") or as a number (e.g. 108), or the short_name of the concept.
"code"

or "name" depending if you want to search by hic_code or short_name

Value

a lookup table

Examples

lookup_hic(108)

#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>   code_name         short_name
#>   <chr>             <chr>     
#> 1 NIHR_HIC_ICU_0108 Heart rate
lookup_hic("NIHR_HIC_ICU_0108")

#> Error in filter(., .data$code_name == .code_name): Problem while computing `..1 = .data$code_name == .code_name`.
